name: The Deathly Giveaway
description:
~Info~

Made for the Fam Jam 5 Game Jam.

Most SFX and audio from https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/ 

Most Models from https://sketchfab.com/

Best played with 20% volume or higher.

If lighting for the Webgl breaks, download the game instead.

This is my 2nd ever gam jam! 

~Instructions~
  1. W, A, S, D to move.
  2. Shift to sprint.
  3. Space to jump.
